$interpreted: Desperate Villager: How much longer do we have to walk... I'm tired, I can't go any further... We'll never make it in time... Everybody's gonna be gobbled up...
Optimistic Villager: Pull yourself together! We've nearly found the Monster Enchantress! We've just got keep going—
Desperate Villager: Monster Enchantress... Does she even exist? A witch who can speak to monsters and drive them away...
Optimistic Villager: Of course she does! We've come this far, we're sure to find her!
Optimistic Villager: Monsters... Monsters incoming!
Desperate Villager: We can't escape... We're gonna get eaten... It's our fate...
Nolva: H-hang in there!
Nolva: I'm sorry, please don't attack them. Please, leave them.
Desperate Villager: ...Is she talking to the monsters?
Optimistic Villager: Are you insane? What kind of idiot are you!?
Nolva: N-no, I'm... Monsters can communicate, as long as that voice...
Desperate Villager: Gwaaaah! Stay away from me!! Get out of here!
Nolva: No! Please, don't go!!
: Stop.
Nolva: Awesome! See what I mean?
Optimistic Villager: ...D-did they really hear her?
: Go back where you came.
Optimistic Villager: Heck, what am I seeing...
Nolva: Thank you...
Desperate Villager: ...Who's she talking to? This is making me uncomfortable...
Optimistic Villager: She's talking to someone we can't hear, ordering the monsters about...
Optimistic Villager: ...Could this be the Monster Enchantress!?
Nolva: ...Uh... Well, some people do call me that.
Optimistic Villager: So it's you! It's said that you were parasitized by a monster and thus especially monstrous and terrifying, but you're actually kinda cute—
Desperate Villager: S-sorry, Miss Enchantress, please forgive his rudeness! Spare us our lives!
Nolva: Oh, that's okay! Please, get up—
Desperate Villager: N-n-no! We're just simple humans, please let us go!!
Nolva: ......
Roger: —So, your village was destroyed and you've come to seek protection, is that it?
Roger: Come with me. I'll find a place to put you up.
Kittyeyes: All right, come on then! Nolva's very sweet, she wouldn't get mad at you!
Roger: Leave the rest to me. You go back and rest.
Nolva: Okay...
Nolva: ...So you can't help but attack everybody?
Nolva: Ugh, don't you get it... Am I asking too much of you?
Merchant: Miss Nolva, you're here~
Nolva: Hmm?
Merchant: Ah, sorry, sorry! Perhaps I should be calling you Miss Monster Enchantress now?

Nolva: Just call me Nolva~
There's fewer and fewer people calling me by my name now, I'm just a little surprised is all.
Merchant: I see! After all, you're the famed Enchantress now. That's enough to scare any gutless cowards away~ Heheh~
Nolva: So, you've also come under the protection of the citizen guard...
Merchant: Yup. Business has plummeted thanks to those monsters. But at least my life is in safe hands, thanks to you, Miss Nolva.
Nolva: I'm sorry to hear it...
Merchant: Miss Nolva, isn't there anything you can do to make the monsters all disappear?
Nolva: I've tried, but...
Nolva: ...Actually, I've been trying to communicate with them through a particular voice. But I don't know who that voice actually belongs to.
Nolva: And it's not totally audible every time. I don't even know why that voice wants to help me...
Nolva: ...Fate...!?
Merchant: What is it, Miss Nolva!?
Nolva: ...Ah, I thought I heard...
Nolva: ...No, it's nothing.
Merchant: All right then~ I was worried I'd made you angry. I thought you were summoning monsters to take care of me, heheh~
Nolva: N-n-no, I'd never do such a thing! Everybody's got me wrong, it's not like that at all!
Merchant: If you're sure you can't summon monsters, I'm sure you'll be fine~!
Merchant: Did y'all here that? She'd never do anything like that~
Nolva: Wh... What are you all doing?
Merchant: How big a bounty could we get from the Twelve Nobles for a legendary Monster Enchantress~?
Nolva: You... want to hand me to the nobles?
Merchant: Of course, you're hot property right now~ Let's move!
Kittyeyes: You no-good schemers, keep your paws off Nolva!
Kittyeyes: Where are you going! Give us our money back!
Nolva: Forget it, Kittyeyes. Let them run.
Nolva: The monsters have brought hard times on all of us... And I'm to blame, too.
Nolva: Nobody's been willing to speak to me for a long time now, except for you and Roger. I was so happy that I let my guard down...
Kittyeyes: Nolva...
Kittyeyes: If it weren't for you, we'd all be dead as dust already. You've done nothing wrong. Don't worry, me and Roger will take care of you.
Kittyeyes: And Waverylde's still here, too~
???: ...Who's Waverlyde?
Kittyeyes: Roger!? You're hurt!
Roger: Guh... Don't mind me. Take Nolva...
???: You can all flee if you want, but leave the Monster Enchantress behind.
???: Evil must be punished.
???: You're Nolva Carpenter, aren't you. The one who calls herself the Monster Enchantress.
Nolva: ...Nolva Carpenter, that's me...
???: Good.
???: Prepare to die, imposter of Sdorica.
???: (Fast and slow are relative to one another, but good and evil are absolute. The Exalted One taught me that...)
???: (I don't understand... Why are they so angry... Isn't it obvious... I've freed them from evil...)
: If you don't understand, then just trust me. Unlike humans with their weak spots, dragons are absolute beings.
???: (The moment I was driven out, a hand reached toward me...)
???: (I became a bodyguard, always at their side. And grateful for it. I'd happily let myself be torn and smashed to pieces...)
???: (Drowning in our regrets, those of us who remained formed a sect to bring the Exalted One back... But...)
???: (The eclipse was shattered, evil. If the Exalted One were here, this would never...)
???: (I wasn't strong enough. I should have given the True Sun's position up to someone more suitable...)
???: (And then, at that moment, I heard some strange news...)
???: (Only the Exalted One could control the monsters. Even the Immortals weren't able to do that... and the Monster Enchantress?)
???: (Evil enough to dare impersonate the Exalted One... I have to punish her. That's all I can do!)
Nolva: ...Gah... Kittyeyes... Roger... Why... Who are you...
???: My name has long been wiped from the Soul Crystals. Aside from the Exalted One, not even the Immortals remember it now.
???: And you, faced with your own death, have no need for it now either.
???: ...The monsters... are coming to save you...!?
Nolva: ...Hugo?
Nolva: The voice is telling me... Your name is Hugo.

Model.Text: How much longer do we have to walk... I'm tired, I can't go any further... We'll never make it in time... Everybody's gonna be gobbled up...
Pull yourself together! We've nearly found the Monster Enchantress! We've just got keep going—
Monster Enchantress... Does she even exist? A witch who can speak to monsters and drive them away...
Of course she does! We've come this far, we're sure to find her!
Monsters... Monsters incoming!
We can't escape... We're gonna get eaten... It's our fate...
H-hang in there!
I'm sorry, please don't attack them. Please, leave them.
...Is she talking to the monsters?
Are you insane? What kind of idiot are you!?
N-no, I'm... Monsters can communicate, as long as that voice...
Gwaaaah! Stay away from me!! Get out of here!
No! Please, don't go!!
Stop.
Awesome! See what I mean?
...D-did they really hear her?
Go back where you came.
Heck, what am I seeing...
Thank you...
...Who's she talking to? This is making me uncomfortable...
She's talking to someone we can't hear, ordering the monsters about...
...Could this be the Monster Enchantress!?
...Uh... Well, some people do call me that.
So it's you! It's said that you were parasitized by a monster and thus especially monstrous and terrifying, but you're actually kinda cute—
S-sorry, Miss Enchantress, please forgive his rudeness! Spare us our lives!
Oh, that's okay! Please, get up—
N-n-no! We're just simple humans, please let us go!!
—So, your village was destroyed and you've come to seek protection, is that it?
Come with me. I'll find a place to put you up.
All right, come on then! Nolva's very sweet, she wouldn't get mad at you!
Leave the rest to me. You go back and rest.
Okay...
...So you can't help but attack everybody?
Ugh, don't you get it... Am I asking too much of you?
Miss Nolva, you're here~
Hmm?
Ah, sorry, sorry! Perhaps I should be calling you Miss Monster Enchantress now?

Just call me Nolva~
There's fewer and fewer people calling me by my name now, I'm just a little surprised is all.
I see! After all, you're the famed Enchantress now. That's enough to scare any gutless cowards away~ Heheh~
So, you've also come under the protection of the citizen guard...
Yup. Business has plummeted thanks to those monsters. But at least my life is in safe hands, thanks to you, Miss Nolva.
I'm sorry to hear it...
Miss Nolva, isn't there anything you can do to make the monsters all disappear?
I've tried, but...
...Actually, I've been trying to communicate with them through a particular voice. But I don't know who that voice actually belongs to.
And it's not totally audible every time. I don't even know why that voice wants to help me...
What is it, Miss Nolva!?
...Ah, I thought I heard...
...No, it's nothing.
All right then~ I was worried I'd made you angry. I thought you were summoning monsters to take care of me, heheh~
N-n-no, I'd never do such a thing! Everybody's got me wrong, it's not like that at all!
If you're sure you can't summon monsters, I'm sure you'll be fine~!
Did y'all here that? She'd never do anything like that~
Wh... What are you all doing?
How big a bounty could we get from the Twelve Nobles for a legendary Monster Enchantress~?
You... want to hand me to the nobles?
Of course, you're hot property right now~ Let's move!
You no-good schemers, keep your paws off Nolva!
Where are you going! Give us our money back!
Forget it, Kittyeyes. Let them run.
The monsters have brought hard times on all of us... And I'm to blame, too.
Nobody's been willing to speak to me for a long time now, except for you and Roger. I was so happy that I let my guard down...
Nolva...
If it weren't for you, we'd all be dead as dust already. You've done nothing wrong. Don't worry, me and Roger will take care of you.
And Waverylde's still here, too~
...Who's Waverlyde?
Roger!? You're hurt!
Guh... Don't mind me. Take Nolva...
You can all flee if you want, but leave the Monster Enchantress behind.
Evil must be punished.
You're Nolva Carpenter, aren't you. The one who calls herself the Monster Enchantress.
...Nolva Carpenter, that's me...
Good.
Prepare to die, imposter of Sdorica.
(Fast and slow are relative to one another, but good and evil are absolute. The Exalted One taught me that...)
(I don't understand... Why are they so angry... Isn't it obvious... I've freed them from evil...)
If you don't understand, then just trust me. Unlike humans with their weak spots, dragons are absolute beings.
(The moment I was driven out, a hand reached toward me...)
(I became a bodyguard, always at their side. And grateful for it. I'd happily let myself be torn and smashed to pieces...)
(Drowning in our regrets, those of us who remained formed a sect to bring the Exalted One back... But...)
(The eclipse was shattered, evil. If the Exalted One were here, this would never...)
(I wasn't strong enough. I should have given the True Sun's position up to someone more suitable...)
(And then, at that moment, I heard some strange news...)
(Only the Exalted One could control the monsters. Even the Immortals weren't able to do that... and the Monster Enchantress?)
(Evil enough to dare impersonate the Exalted One... I have to punish her. That's all I can do!)
...Gah... Kittyeyes... Roger... Why... Who are you...
My name has long been wiped from the Soul Crystals. Aside from the Exalted One, not even the Immortals remember it now.
And you, faced with your own death, have no need for it now either.
...The monsters... are coming to save you...!?
...Hugo?
The voice is telling me... Your name is Hugo.

But at least my life is in safe hands, thanks to you, Miss Nolva.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_005_dialog_english##_28_002","SpeakerName":"Nolva","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0097","IconName":"h0097s5_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I'm sorry to hear it...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_005_dialog_english##_28_003","SpeakerName":"Merchant","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0099c3","IconName":"h0099c3_nervous","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Miss Nolva, isn't there anything you can do to make the monsters all disappear?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_005_dialog_english##_29_000","SpeakerName":"Nolva","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0097","IconName":"h0097s5_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I've tried, but...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_005_dialog_english##_30_000","SpeakerName":"Nolva","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0097","IconName":"h0097s5_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...Actually, I've been trying to communicate with them through a particular voice. But I don't know who that voice actually belongs to.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_005_dialog_english##_30_001","SpeakerName":"Nolva","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0097","IconName":"h0097s5_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"And it's not totally audible every time. I don't even know why that voice wants to help me...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_005_dialog_english##_30_002","SpeakerName":"","SpeakerAssetName":"","IconName":"","IconLocate":1,"Text":"#\u035d#\u031b\u0358$\u0327\u035e&\u0335\u0361\u035e\u0315\u0336@\u0328\u0327\u0327!\u0335\u0327\u034f%\u035f\u035c\u0335\u0327\u0360$\u0328\u0360$\u0322\u0340\u0335*\u031b\u0337\u034f\u0341#\u0336\u0358\u0341\u0322Fa#\u0338\u0340\u0340\u0362*\u035d\u0362\u0362\u0334*\u0328\u031b\u0336\u031b\u0327&\u034f\u0340^\u0322\u035c*\u0362\u0328@\u0360\u0334te^\u0338\u0334\u0341%\u0337\u035c","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_005_dialog_english##_31_000","SpeakerName":"Nolva","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0097","IconName":"h0097s5_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...Fate...!?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_005_dialog_english##_32_000","SpeakerName":"Merchant","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0099c3","IconName":"h0099c3_nervous","IconLocate":2,"Text":"What is it, Miss Nolva!?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_005_dialog_english##_32_001","SpeakerName":"Nolva","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0097","IconName":"h0097s5_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...Ah, I thought I heard...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_005_dialog_english##_33_000","SpeakerName":"Nolva","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0097","IconName":"h0097s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...No, it's nothing.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_005_dialog_english##_34_000","SpeakerName":"Merchant","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0099c3","IconName":"h0099c3_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"All right then~ I was worried I'd made you angry. I thought you were summoning monsters to take care of me, heheh~","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_005_dialog_english##_35_000","SpeakerName":"Nolva","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0097","IconName":"h0097s5_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"N-n-no, I'd never do such a thing! Everybody's got me wrong, it's not like that at all!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_005_dialog_english##_36_000","SpeakerName":"Merchant","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0099c3","IconName":"h0099c3_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"If you're sure you can't summon monsters, I'm sure you'll be fine~!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_005_dialog_english##_37_000","SpeakerName":"Merchant","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0099c3","IconName":"h0099c3_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Did y'all here that? She'd never do anything like that~","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_005_dialog_english##_38_000","SpeakerName":"Nolva","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0097","IconName":"h0097s5_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Wh... What are you all doing?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_005_dialog_english##_38_001","SpeakerName":"Merchant","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0099c3","IconName":"h0099c3_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"How big a bounty could we get from the Twelve Nobles for a legendary Monster Enchantress~?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_005_dialog_english##_38_002","SpeakerName":"Nolva","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0097","IconName":"h0097s5_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You... want to hand me to the nobles?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_005_dialog_english##_38_003","SpeakerName":"Merchant","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0099c3","IconName":"h0099c3_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Of course, you're hot property right now~ Let's move!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_005_dialog_english##_38_004","SpeakerName":"Kittyeyes","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0004","IconName":"h0004s5_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You no-good schemers, keep your paws off Nolva!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_005_dialog_english##_39_000","SpeakerName":"Kittyeyes","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0004","IconName":"h0004s5_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Where are you going! Give us our money back!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_005_dialog_english##_39_001","SpeakerName":"Nolva","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0097","IconName":"h0097s5_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Forget it, Kittyeyes. Let them run.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_005_dialog_english##_40_000","SpeakerName":"Nolva","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0097","IconName":"h0097s5_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"The monsters have brought hard times on all of us... And I'm to blame, too.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_005_dialog_english##_40_001","SpeakerName":"Nolva","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0097","IconName":"h0097s5_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Nobody's been willing to speak to me for a long time now, except for you and Roger. I was so happy that I let my guard down...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_005_dialog_english##_41_000","SpeakerName":"Kittyeyes","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0004","IconName":"h0004s5_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Nolva...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_005_dialog_english##_42_000","SpeakerName":"Kittyeyes","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0004","IconName":"h0004s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"If it weren't for you, we'd all be dead as dust already. You've done nothing wrong. Don't worry, me and Roger will take care of you.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_005_dialog_english##_43_000","SpeakerName":"Kittyeyes","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0004","IconName":"h0004s5_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"And Waverylde's still here, too~","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_005_dialog_english##_43_001","SpeakerName":"???","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0232","IconName":"h0232s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...Who's Waverlyde?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_005_dialog_english##_44_000","SpeakerName":"Kittyeyes","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0004","IconName":"h0004s5_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Roger!? You're hurt!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_005_dialog_english##_44_001","SpeakerName":"Roger","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0006","IconName":"h0006s4_nervous","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Guh... Don't mind me. Take Nolva...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_005_dialog_english##_44_002","SpeakerName":"???","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0232","IconName":"h0232s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You can all flee if you want, but leave the Monster Enchantress behind.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_005_dialog_english##_45_000","SpeakerName":"???","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0232","IconName":"h0232s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Evil must be punished.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_005_dialog_english##_46_000","SpeakerName":"???","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0232","IconName":"h0232s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You're Nolva Carpenter, aren't you. The one who calls herself the Monster Enchantress.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_005_dialog_english##_47_000","SpeakerName":"Nolva","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0097","IconName":"h0097s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...Nolva Carpenter, that's me...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_005_dialog_english##_47_001","SpeakerName":"???","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0232","IconName":"h0232s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Good.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_005_dialog_english##_48_000","SpeakerName":"???","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0232","IconName":"h0232s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Prepare to die, imposter of Sdorica.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_005_dialog_english##_49_000","SpeakerName":"???","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0232","IconName":"h0232s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"(Fast and slow are relative to one another, but good and evil are absolute. The Exalted One taught me that...)","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_005_dialog_english##_50_000","SpeakerName":"???","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0232","IconName":"h0232s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"(I don't understand... Why are they so angry... Isn't it obvious... I've freed them from evil...)","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_005_dialog_english##_51_000","SpeakerName":"","SpeakerAssetName":"","IconName":"","IconLocate":1,"Text":"If you don't understand, then just trust me. Unlike humans with their weak spots, dragons are absolute beings.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_005_dialog_english##_51_001","SpeakerName":"???","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0232","IconName":"h0232s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"(The moment I was driven out, a hand reached toward me...)","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_005_dialog_english##_52_000","SpeakerName":"???","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0232","IconName":"h0232s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"(I became a bodyguard, always at their side. And grateful for it. I'd happily let myself be torn and smashed to pieces...)","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_005_dialog_english##_53_000","SpeakerName":"???","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0232","IconName":"h0232s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"(Drowning in our regrets, those of us who remained formed a sect to bring the Exalted One back... But...)","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_005_dialog_english##_54_000","SpeakerName":"???","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0232","IconName":"h0232s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"(The eclipse was shattered, evil. If the Exalted One were here, this would never...)","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_005_dialog_english##_54_001","SpeakerName":"???","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0232","IconName":"h0232s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"(I wasn't strong enough. I should have given the True Sun's position up to someone more suitable...)","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_005_dialog_english##_54_002","SpeakerName":"???","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0232","IconName":"h0232s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"(And then, at that moment, I heard some strange news...)","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_005_dialog_english##_55_000","SpeakerName":"???","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0232","IconName":"h0232s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"(Only the Exalted One could control the monsters. Even the Immortals weren't able to do that... and the Monster Enchantress?)","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_005_dialog_english##_55_001","SpeakerName":"???","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0232","IconName":"h0232s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"(Evil enough to dare impersonate the Exalted One... I have to punish her. That's all I can do!)","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_005_dialog_english##_56_000","SpeakerName":"Nolva","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0097","IconName":"h0097s5_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...Gah... Kittyeyes... Roger... Why... Who are you...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_005_dialog_english##_56_001","SpeakerName":"???","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0232","IconName":"h0232s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"My name has long been wiped from the Soul Crystals. Aside from the Exalted One, not even the Immortals remember it now.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_005_dialog_english##_56_002","SpeakerName":"???","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0232","IconName":"h0232s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"And you, faced with your own death, have no need for it now either.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_005_dialog_english##_57_000","SpeakerName":"???","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0232","IconName":"h0232s4_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...The monsters... are coming to save you...!?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_005_dialog_english##_58_000","SpeakerName":"Nolva","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0097","IconName":"h0097s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...Hugo?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_005_dialog_english##_59_000","SpeakerName":"???","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0232","IconName":"h0232s4_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_404_005_dialog_english##_59_001","SpeakerName":"Nolva","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0097","IconName":"h0097s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"The voice is telling me... Your name is Hugo.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0}]}
